pull up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to stop the vehicle that you are driving
pull up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: He pulled up in front of the gates.
pull up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to get a chair etc and sit down next to someone who is already sitting
pull up.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to stop someone who is doing something wrong and tell them you do not approve
pull up.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: I felt I had to pull her up on her lateness.
pull up.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an exercise in which you use your arms to pull yourself up towards a bar above your head
